snippet: Mariano Rivera is one of the best closers in the game, thanks in part to a cutter pitch that leaves his hand much like a fastball but crosses the plate very differently.
lead_paragraph: Mariano Rivera is one of the best closers in the game, thanks in part to a cutter pitch that leaves his hand much like a fastball but crosses the plate very differently.

headline.main: In 3-D: How Mariano Rivera Dominates Hitters
